main event: On 9 May 1949, a military sergeant observed two round, silvery, flat objects flying at high speeds in Tucson, Arizona.
interesting points: The objects were seen flying in formation, at approximately 10,000 feet altitude., The observer described the objects as having a diameter of about 25 feet and a thickness of 1 foot., No sound or visible propulsion was detected during the sighting., The objects traveled at an estimated speed of 750 to 1,000 mph., The incident lasted between 6 to 10 seconds before the objects faded from view.
witness description: W/Sgt. from the USAF, experienced with aircraft and noted for his reliability.
